item.title: Some useful git tips
item.description: Here will be useful git tips and just repeating commands I often use but can’t remember.

item.title: Creating a public rsa key when you already have a private one
item.description: To create a public rsa key using a private one, simply type: $ ssh-keygen -y -f /path/to/private_rsa > /path/to/public_rsa Note that it is not adding user@hostname, so if you need it, add this in the end of public_rsa file with a leading space symbol
